source.601e1669:
location=df['Location'].value_counts().nlargest(n=10)
fig=px.bar(y=location,x=location.index, orientation='v',color=location)
fig.update_layout(width=800, 
                  showlegend=False, 
                  xaxis_title="City",
                  yaxis_title="Count",
                  title="Top 10 cities by job count")
fig.show()
